thread.title: Michael Moore's former vacation home on market for $5.2M
thread.title_full: Michael Moore's former vacation home on market for $5.2M

title: Michael Moore's former vacation home on market for $5.2M
text:
Michael Moore's former vacation home near Traverse City on market for $5.2M 
THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Published: 8/6/15 1:32 am EDT - Updated: 8/6/15 1:34 am EDT 
CENTRAL LAKE, Michigan â€” Filmmaker Michael Moore's former vacation home in the Traverse City area is up for sale. 
The Flint Journal ( http://bit.ly/1UpwtLn ) reports the home on Torch Lake in northern Michigan is on the market for $5.2 million. Broker Nancy Albrecht says she and another broker listed the property July 30. 
Albrecht says the home has seven bedrooms and eight bathrooms, and there's a guest cottage on the property. There are also five fireplaces, a gym and an art studio in the house. 
The property is owned by Moore's ex-wife Kathleen Glynn. He filed for divorce in 2013. 
Information from: The Flint Journal, http://www.mlive.com/flint
